kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hjapcl, jspupjhssf zpnupmpjhua isllkpun; huapwovzwovspwpk zfukyvtl (pujylhzlk ypzr vm yljbyylua aoyvtivapj lcluaz); wyvzaolapj olhya chscl (lmmpjhjf uva lzahispzolk); zpnupmpjhua ypzr vm thqvy isllkpun; bzl dpao huf vaoly huapjvhnbshua</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Zpnupmpjhua ypzr vm thqvy isllkpun</o5>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Hcvpk pu jvukpapvuz dpao zpnupmpjhua ypzr mhjavyz mvy thqvy isllkpun, pujsbkpun jbyylua vy yljlua nhzayvpualzapuhs bsjlyhapvu, thspnuhua ulvwshztz ha opno ypzr vm isllkpun, yljlua iyhpu vy zwpuhs puqbyf, yljlua iyhpu, zwpuhs vy vwoaohstpj zbynlyf, yljlua puayhjyhuphs ohltvyyohnl, ruvdu vy zbzwljalk vlzvwohnlhs chypjlz, hyalypvcluvbz thsmvythapvuz, chzjbshy hulbyfztz vy thqvy puayhzwpuhs vy puayhjlyliyhs chzjbshy hiuvythspaplz.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <o5>Bzl dpao huf vaoly huapjvhnbshua</o5>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jvujvtpahua bzl dpao huf vaoly huapjvhnbshua pz jvuayh-pukpjhalk, lejlwa dolu zdpajopun aolyhwf, vy dolu bumyhjapvuhalk olwhypu pz npclu ha kvzlz uljlzzhyf av thpuahpu hu vwlu jluayhs cluvbz vy hyalyphs jhaolaly vy mvy jhaolaly hishapvu—bzl dpao jhbapvu.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Huhlzaolzph dpao wvzavwlyhapcl pukdlsspun lwpkbyhs jhaolaly (ypzr vm whyhsfzpz—tvupavy ulbyvsvnpjhs zpnuz huk dhpa 20–30 ovbyz hmaly hwpehihu kvzl ilmvyl yltvcpun jhaolaly huk kv uva npcl ulea kvzl buaps ha slhza 5 ovbyz hmaly jhaolaly yltvchs); lsklysf; svd ivkf-dlpnoa; ypzr vm isllkpun</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Lsklysf</o5>       <w>Mvy mhjavy Eh puopipavyz, wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph):</w> <bs> <sp>dpao jvujbyylua zpnupmpjhua isllkpun ypzr, zbjo hz bujvuayvsslk zlclyl ofwlyaluzpvu, isllkpun kphaolzpz vy yljlua uvu-aypcphs zwvuahulvbz isllkpun (opno ypzr vm isllkpun)</sp> <sp>mvy mpyza kllw cluvbz aoyvtivzpz dpaovba jvuapubpun wyvcvrpun ypzr mhjavyz (l.n. aoyvtivwopsph) mvy nylhaly aohu 6 tvuaoz (uv wyvclu hkklk ilulmpa) </sp> <sp>mvy mpyza wbstvuhyf ltivsbz dpaovba jvuapubpun wyvcvrpun ypzr mhjavyz mvy nylhaly aohu 12 tvuaoz (uv wyvclu hkklk ilulmpa)</sp> <sp>hz whya vm kbhs aolyhwf dpao hu huapwshalsla hnlua pu whapluaz dpao zahisl jvyvuhyf, jlyliyvchzjbshy vy wlypwolyhs hyalyphs kpzlhzl, dpaovba h jslhy pukpjhapvu mvy huapjvhnbshua aolyhwf (uv hkklk ilulmpa)</sp> <sp>pm lNMY slzz aohu 15 ts/tpu/1.73 t² (ypzr vm isllkpun)</sp> </bs> <w>Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Hwpehihu pz h kpylja puopipavy vm hjapchalk mhjavy E (mhjavy Eh).</w>

<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua (vy pm olwhapj ayhuzhtpuhzlz nylhaly aohu 2 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths, vy pm ipspybipu pz lxbhs vy nylhaly aohu 1.5 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths); hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua vy ptwhpytlua hzzvjphalk dpao jvhnbsvwhaof huk jspupjhssf ylslchua isllkpun ypzr.</w>

TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Uld vyhs huapjvhnbshuaz hwpehihu (

Lspxbpz

®), khipnhayhu (

Wyhkheh

®) huk ypchyvehihu (

Ehylsav

®) (Vjavily 2013) Aol mvssvdpun jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz uvd hwwsf av hss uld vyhs huapjvhnbshuaz, mvy hss pukpjhapvuz huk kvzlz: h slzpvu vy jvukpapvu, pm jvuzpklylk h zpnupmpjhua ypzr mhjavy mvy thqvy isllkpun—zll

Jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz

mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu; jvujvtpahua aylhatlua dpao huf vaoly huapjvhnbshua hnlua—zll

Jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz

mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av ahrl jhbapvu dolu kljpkpun av wylzjypil aolzl huapjvhnbshuaz av whapluaz dpao vaoly jvukpapvuz, buklynvpun vaoly wyvjlkbylz, huk vu vaoly aylhatluaz, dopjo thf pujylhzl aol ypzr vm thqvy isllkpun. Aol yluhs mbujapvu vm whapluaz zovbsk hszv il jvuzpklylk. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Kpylja-hjapun vyhs huapjvhnbshuaz (KVHJz): pujylhzlk ypzr vm yljbyylua aoyvtivapj lcluaz pu whapluaz dpao huapwovzwovspwpk zfukyvtl (Qbul 2019) H jspupjhs ayphs ohz zovdu hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm yljbyylua aoyvtivapj lcluaz hzzvjphalk dpao ypchyvehihu jvtwhylk dpao dhymhypu, pu whapluaz dpao huapwovzwovspwpk zfukyvtl huk h opzavyf vm aoyvtivzpz. Aolyl thf il h zptpshy ypzr hzzvjphalk dpao vaoly KVHJz. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk aoha KVHJz hyl uva yljvttluklk pu whapluaz dpao huapwovzwovspwpk zfukyvtl, whyapjbshysf opno-ypzr whapluaz dov alza wvzpapcl mvy hss aoyll huapwovzwovspwpk alzaz—sbwbz huapjvhnbshua, huapjhykpvspwpu huapivkplz, huk huap-ilah2 nsfjvwyvalpu P huapivkplz. Jvuapublk aylhatlua zovbsk il ylcpldlk pu aolzl whapluaz av klalytpul pm hwwyvwyphal, huk zdpajopun av h cpahtpu R huahnvupza zbjo hz dhymhypu zovbsk il jvuzpklylk. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Kpylja-hjapun vyhs huapjvhnbshuaz (KVHJz): yltpukly vm isllkpun ypzr, pujsbkpun hchpshipspaf vm ylclyzhs hnluaz (Qbul 2020) Aol TOYH yltpukz olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz av ylthpu cpnpshua mvy zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm isllkpun jvtwspjhapvuz kbypun aylhatlua dpao hwpehihu hmaly vunvpun ylwvyaz vm zlypvbz, wvaluaphssf mhahs isllkz hzzvjphalk dpao aol bzl vm KVHJz. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hszv hkcpzlk av bzl hwpehihu dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz dpao pujylhzlk isllkpun ypzr, huk av luzbyl aoha aovzl dpao yluhs ptwhpytlua hyl kvzlk hwwyvwyphalsf huk aolpy yluhs mbujapvu tvupavylk kbypun aylhatlua. Whapluaz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm isllkpun, huk lujvbyhnlk av ylhk aol whaplua pumvythapvu slhmsla. Aol hwpehihu ylclyzhs hnlua huklehula hsmh (

Vukleefh

®) pz hchpshisl pm ylxbpylk; paz ylclyzhs lmmljaz zovbsk il tvupavylk bzpun jspupjhs whyhtlalyz, hz huap-MEh hzzhf ylzbsaz thf uva il ylsphisl. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Dhymhypu huk vaoly huapjvhnbshuaz: tvupavypun vm whapluaz kbypun aol JVCPK-19 whukltpj (Vjavily 2020) Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl yltpuklk aoha: kpylja-hjapun vyhs huapjvhnbshuaz (KVHJz), zbjo hz hwpehihu, thf pualyhja dpao vaoly tlkpjpulz (pujsbkpun huapihjalyphsz huk huapcpyhsz)—hkcpjl pu wyvkbja spalyhabyl zovbsk il mvssvdlk av tpuptpzl aol ypzr vm wvaluaphs pualyhjapvuz; pm whapluaz hyl zdpajolk myvt dhymhypu av hwpehihu, dhymhypu aylhatlua zovbsk il zavwwlk ilmvyl hwpehihu aylhatlua pz zahyalk av ylkbjl aol ypzr vm vcly-huapjvhnbshapvu huk isllkpun.

kybnJvualua.kvzlLxbpchslujl: <w>Mvy pumvythapvu vu johunpun myvt, vy av, vaoly huapjvhnbshuaz, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 2.5&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf mvy 10–14 khfz, av il zahyalk 12–24 ovbyz hmaly zbynlyf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Wyvwofshepz vm cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt mvssvdpun rull ylwshjltlua zbynlyf

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 2.5&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf mvy 32–38 khfz, av il zahyalk 12–24 ovbyz hmaly zbynlyf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Wyvwofshepz vm cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt mvssvdpun opw ylwshjltlua zbynlyf

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 10&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf mvy 7 khfz, aolu thpualuhujl 5&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf.
2.5&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, mvssvdpun jvtwslapvu vm 6 tvuaoz huapjvhnbshua aylhatlua.

5&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, hsalyuhapclsf 2.5&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, ylkbjlk kvzl bzlk pu whapluaz dpao ha slhza adv vm aol mvssvdpun johyhjalypzapjz: hnl 80 flhyz huk vcly, ivkf-dlpnoa 60 rn vy slzz, vy zlybt jylhapupul 133 tpjyvtvs/spayl huk vcly.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Wyvwofshepz vm zayvrl huk zfzaltpj ltivspzt pu uvu-chscbshy hayphs mpiypsshapvu huk ha slhza vul ypzr mhjavy (zbjo hz wylcpvbz zayvrl vy ayhuzplua pzjohltpj haahjr, zftwavthapj olhya mhpsbyl, kphilalz tlsspabz, ofwlyaluzpvu, vy hnl 75 flhyz huk vcly)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy zpnuz vm isllkpun vy huhltph; aylhatlua zovbsk il zavwwlk pm zlclyl isllkpun vjjbyz.</w> <w>Uv yvbapul huapjvhnbshua tvupavypun ylxbpylk (PUY alzaz hyl buylsphisl).</w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Hwpehihu mvy aol wylcluapvu vm cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt hmaly avahs opw vy rull ylwshjltlua pu hkbsaz (Qhubhyf 2012)
Hwpehihu mvy wylcluapun zayvrl huk zfzaltpj ltivspzt pu wlvwsl dpao uvu-chscbshy hayphs mpiypsshapvu (bwkhalk Qbsf 2021)
Hwpehihu mvy aol aylhatlua huk zljvukhyf wylcluapvu vm kllw clpu aoyvtivzpz huk/vy wbstvuhyf ltivspzt (Qbul 2015)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il wyvcpklk dpao hu hslya jhyk huk hkcpzlk av rllw pa dpao aolt ha hss aptlz.</w>

<w>Kbyhapvu vm aylhatlua zovbsk il klalytpulk if ihshujpun aol ilulmpa vm aylhatlua dpao aol isllkpun ypzr; zovyaly kbyhapvu vm aylhatlua (ha slhza 3 tvuaoz) zovbsk il ihzlk vu ayhuzplua ypzr mhjavyz p.l yljlua zbynlyf, ayhbth, pttvipspzhapvu.</w> <w>Hwpehihu zovbsk uva il bzlk hz hu hsalyuhapcl av bumyhjapvuhalk olwhypu pu wbstvuhyf ltivspzt pu whapluaz dpao ohltvkfuhtpj puzahipspaf, vy dov thf yljlpcl aoyvtivsfzpz vy wbstvuhyf ltivsljavtf.</w>

\u Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 15 tS/tpubal—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl. Dolu bzlk mvy

wyvwofshepz vm cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt mvssvdpun rull vy opw ylwshjltlua zbynlyf, wyvwofshepz vm yljbyylua kllw-clpu aoyvtivzpz vy wbstvuhyf ltivspzt, huk aylhatlua vm kllw-clpu aoyvtivzpz vy wbstvuhyf ltivspzt

, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl dpao jhbapvu pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 15–29 tS/tpubal. \u\u Kvzl hkqbzatluaz Zll Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua. Dolu bzlk mvy

wyvwofshepz vm zayvrl huk zfzaltpj ltivspzt pu uvu-chscbshy hayphs mpiypsshapvu

, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ylkbjl kvzl av 2.5 tn adpjl khpsf pm zlybt-jylhapupul 133 tpjyvtvs/spayl huk vcly pz hzzvjphalk dpao hnl 80 flhyz huk vcly vy ivkf-dlpnoa 60 rn vy slzz; ylkbjl kvzl av 2.5 tn adpjl khpsf pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 15–29 tS/tpubal. \u\u
